text: Shout at the Devil is a 1976 British war adventure movie directed by Peter R. Hunt and is based on the 1968 novel of the same name by Wilbur Smith. It stars Lee Marvin, Roger Moore, Barbara Parkins, Ian Holm and Rene Kolldehoff. The movie set in Zanzibar and German East Africa. == Other websites == * Category:1976 war movies Category:1976 adventure movies Category:British war movies Category:British adventure movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Peter R. Hunt Category:Movies set in Africa
title: Shout at the Devil (movie)
